storyInfo: The team encounters the rescued revenant at the top of the tower. It tells them of Theresa's ambition, and Theresa appears with awe-inspiring presence.

attributes.content: We weren't imagining it!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Heaven and earth reversed in the blink of an eye.;Strange, I don't seem to feel any discomfort.

attributes.content: Do not be distracted by any changes in the rules of the Assimilated Universe.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Mortals were never made to set foot in this place. There is no point in trying to judge the line between the real and unreal based on our conceptions.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Look up at the sky.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The golden ocean that Rhodes Island sailed... it's hanging above our heads?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, I see Rhodes Island... and the churning tides.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The myriad souls call to me. They're trying to pour down and drown me—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Logos is still fighting the myriad souls...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't care how above and below change. Tell me...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Where's Her Highness? Doesn't seem like she's here at all.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Damn, this place makes me feel comfortable — that disturbing kind—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But the voice that called to me...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That was Theresa's voice.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...The myriad souls.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She's here. We have already found her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Enough riddles, hag!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Look with your own eyes. Other than those weird pillars, do you see any—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She stops mid-sentence.
Pillar. Tower. Myriad souls. Theresa.
In that instant, she understands why her soul finds this place so comforting.
The myriad souls have taken crimson roots here, extending to the furthest reaches of heaven.
Those white pillars...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: They're Theresa's will. She's trying to stabilize the tower.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She's been watching us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Time does not flow in the Assimilated Universe, but this miracle continues to grow.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's even trying to penetrate the 'sky' that we're standing on.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If she could break through the limits here, that means—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Why are you looking at me like that?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I had to make sure this thing we're standing on is solid enough, right?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Don't want to get it pulled out from beneath my feet when we finally get to see Her Highness.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But this 'sky' is more than what it looks.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: My bombs didn't even leave a mark...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's impossible to damage this place by any physical means.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The 'limits' of this place are set by rules beyond the comprehension of Terra and incredible amounts of information.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It permits neither change nor challenge.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Could've fooled me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're hiding something. Hood was right. This tower has broken through whatever 'limits' you're talking about.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I know you have secrets that not even Hood and Bunny know about.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You've never been here, but you're strangely familiar with many things here.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You hide it well on your face, but you can't fool me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W, don't—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We can't afford to waste any more time.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: If Her Highness has fallen asleep while waiting for us, someone has to put new batteries in the alarm clock.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: She's not as reckless as she looks, Kal'tsit.

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Give me a hand, bunny. There's something I need to make sure...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I was wondering. Why would there be shadows in this hellhole, when there's no sun and no moon?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She throws her flashbang upwards. Rather than fall back to the ground, it keeps going up.
The ball of light rises from the 'sky', flying towards the golden ocean, revealing a blurry shadow.
Over there, Amiya! That shadow that won't go away!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: He's here too...
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: The revenant?!;He might attack again! Careful, Amiya!

attributes.content: I don't sense any hostility. It's like...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He doesn't even notice us.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Wanna do it, bunny? I've got a score to settle with him.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: He must know something about this godforsaken place!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Wait, W!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is strange... he's not like the other myriad souls we've seen, lingering here rather than leaving...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If he's here, does it mean he's dead too?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: No. He's fine... in fact, he's never been better.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: He's fully at peace. I can feel it. A peace filled with sorrow.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What did Her Highness do to him?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Theresa saved him, retaining the last bit of consciousness that the revenant had left.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not only that, she has brought clarity to his chaotic mind.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She cured his madness? She can do that now?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I don't know what Theresa's state is right now.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Can you communicate with the revenant, Amiya?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He may hold the key to the truth.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I can try...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A dark wave ripples from Amiya, touching the black shadow.
The shadow meanders and answers the King's whisper.
You...
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: So, it is you who arrived here after all, in the end.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: The indistinct shadow opens its 'mouth'. His tone is surprisingly calm, with no hint of anger.
An instant of clarity had arrived after millennia of torment, soothing his fury at long last.
It is no coincidence that you are here, Revenant.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Theresa saved me, preserving the fragment of soul that should have disappeared.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: I merely followed her to this place... to witness the turning point of Sarkaz destiny.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: Where did you say Theresa... Her Highness is?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She has departed to retrieve the seed from the very beginning.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: The seed... Amnannam?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Isn't Amnannam already under Sarkaz control? What else is Theresa trying to do?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Originium created everything in this land.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: It has been utilized in many ways, but no one has truly mastered it.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: Except.. Her Highness.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: She said she would steal the fire from the source of all suffering. Our curse will become the weapon that reshapes our lives.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: An immaculate garden for the Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: After all we've been through, I think you know what this means, Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Theresa is fighting for authority over Originium itself.

attributes.content: The vision of Theresa and Theresis goes beyond the limits of all knowledge on Terra.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I can't let Originium become a weapon of mass destruction.

attributes.content: There are no more questions. Kal'tsit gazes at you silently. You have been through too much together.
So you can talk normally, after all, not just all that crap about suffering.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I was human, once.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: ...Hmph.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I had raged against many things in my long existence.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: The invasion of the Ancients, the betrayal of the Sankta, the fall of Kazdel... and my rejection by the myriad souls.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: Until I came here, and learned the true nature of the myriad souls.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: All I feel now is sorrow.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: And you've stopped making sense again.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Did you not see the myriad souls on the golden ocean?
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: All Sarkaz struggle against the injustice of fate their entire lives. There is no release, even in death.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: The myriad souls are only broken fragments of information that linger in this space, imprisoned in another manner by another will...
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: But Her Highness said she would purge purgatory and bring salvation to all Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: You seem to be able to communicate with this old guy, Kal'tsit. Why don't you translate what he's saying?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Is Theresa already able to modify the information within Originium?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This was her promise. Theresa keeps her promises...
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: Ah, finally... Theresa.
attributes.name: Revenant's Shadow

attributes.content: What did you say? Where is she?
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: Amiya, the shadow under your feet!

attributes.content: Shadow?
How could I cast a shadow when there is no light?
No, this is not my shadow!
Amiya looks down and sees the striding white silhouette through the 'sky' that she is standing on.
'Sky' and 'Beyond Sky'.
Theresa and Amiya, reflections of each other.
'Amiya...'
Amiya hears a whisper. She looks up, and Theresa is standing by her side.
She takes Amiya's hand.
Damn. The battlefield... it's changing again!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Vina, the ground... it's rumbling.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Stay at your post, Hannah! Don't get distracted!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: That thing above the Shard just released some strange form of energy.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: If the Sighs of Kings fails—
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Remain alert! Allied command is reporting at least seven coordinates where sudden changes in terrain have occurred!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Three assault ships belonging to the Duke of Abercorn reported destroyed. Communications were lost with two force recon units under the Duke of Ashworth—
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Order all units to stop attacking Hill C-9.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Scatter to the sides, or we'll be swallowed by the waves of Originium.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Got it! Everyone's moving!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: And we've got another really bad news.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Looks like someone's sitting on that empty throne in the Nachzehrer camp...
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: The Nachzehrer King is back...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The fog... it's getting thicker. The Sarkaz are striking back!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Horn, you and Bagpipe coordinate operations with allied command.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You're more familiar with the army's commands. The other units will support us.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Lose this pass, and we'll lose all the ground that we took.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Roger!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I'll help. I'm gettin' used to dealin' with this stuff.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Captain, look... the Gloriana. It's crystalizing quickly. The Sarkaz are besieging it!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: The Duke of Caster is still on the ship.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Victoria can't afford to lose another duke in battle.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We—
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The sound of electrical static, then the same voice is heard over all communications channels on the Victorian side.
Attention all soldiers of the alliance. This is the Duke of Caster, in command of the Gloriana.
attributes.name: Static-Filled Radio

attributes.content: You see as I do how the Sarkaz tyrant has torn our motherland apart.
attributes.name: Static-Filled Radio

attributes.content: The malice and barbarism of our foe merely serves to strengthen our resolve to defend our country.
attributes.name: Static-Filled Radio

attributes.content: As long as our ships and soldiers... *Bzzt*... as long as we all do our duty...
attributes.name: Static-Filled Radio

attributes.content: This is the resolve of Parliament—and every citizen, duke or commoner, general or soldier... *Bzzt*...
attributes.name: Static-Filled Radio

attributes.content: Our foe climbs the broken bow of the Gloriana once more. Originium threatens to devour our fortress.
attributes.name: Static-Filled Radio

attributes.content: But you have not yielded, brave soldiers! Neither will Caster!
attributes.name: Static-Filled Radio

attributes.content: ...*Bzzt* I shall step up to the frontlines and stand with you... *Bzzt* ...
attributes.name: Static-Filled Radio

attributes.content: We stand upon Mother Victoria—
attributes.name: Static-Filled Radio

attributes.content: The Duke of Caster...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Is... is he mad?!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: The steam knight went mad a long time ago, Hannah.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Did I see that right? Did the steam knight just smash into the Gloriana?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: No, he smashed into the almost-crystalized Stone of the Sword and Sighs of Kings...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: What is he trying to do?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: ...He wants to save his Victoria.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Even the frightened soldiers in the rear heard the unusual sound from the Gloriana.
The armor patrols the Stone of the Sword, trampling every Sarkaz who attempts to approach it.
But he could contain the spread of Originium.
'Victoria!!'
He roars, he smashes the ground, but there is nothing he could do to stop the Originium from swallowing the Realmblade—
And so he charged at its foe, towards the Gloriana devoured by Originium.
Originium crystals shatter. The shock sends the Sighs of Kings flying, landing at Vina's feet, before countless eyes wide with astonishment.
Vina pulls out the sword that had been with her for so long.
She points it at the charging foe and spreading fog, not one step back.
She is answered by the call to charge and the sound of blasting steam.
You...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You've grown.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Her tone is as gentle and mild as Amiya remembers.
But Amiya knows that it is not the same Theresa as the one who had once held her in her arms and told her stories all night.
Amiya had so many questions that she had hoped to find the answer for when they met.
But she could not say anything, ask anything.
Theresa would not permit it.
Shh. I can hear the questions within you, Amiya.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: But I can't answer them. All answers, all explanations are pale and powerless.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Our reunion was the product of an accident.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Perhaps I was looking forward to this moment too.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You, Kal'tsit, W... and Doctor. You stand before me.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: I'm sincerely joyful for this reunion. You feel it, don't you?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Why?
She should have been sure. She should not hesitate—
The one before her could not possibly be Theresa.
Why, then, does she look exactly the same as Theresa, not just in her appearance, but also in her expression, her eyes, and the emotions?
You... you're not...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're not... Theresa...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do you truly think that, Amiya?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: The Theresa I know would never do something like this...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Enough, Your Highness.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Damn... I came here thinking I had it thought through, but I couldn't find any words other than 'Your Highness' before that face.
attributes.name: W
Theresa
attributes.content: I remember you...

attributes.name: Theresa
attributes.content: W.
Hah. You remember me. There's no greater honor I've won in my entire career as a merc.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I would have ran up to hug you, if circumstances were any different.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But you don't know, and you don't need to know, how many times I've said goodbye to you already.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: This might sound sentimental, but... you were special to me like no one ever was. You showed a wandering mercenary sights that she never thought she would see.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So, the only way I can repay you is by putting you to rest.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Is that so...?
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You still call me 'Your Highness'. You still remember that I'm the King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: Then the only thing for me to do is to protect the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: What did Theresa just do?!
Amiya turns around to see that everything has changed.
The white pillar has grown at a breathtaking rate. The immeasurable 'tower' of infinity now 'falls' at breakneck pace.
Only the place the she stands upon...
Only around Theresa is there eternal peace and silence.
This tower is beautiful, Amiya.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: It will continue to grow forever, breaking through all limits, and hold up the heavens for the garden that will rewrite Sarkaz destiny.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: How I wanted you to see it...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: But you are not permitted here. Accidents must be eliminated.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: When you stand before me...
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: You're the enemy of the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Theresa

attributes.content: No.
A black crown appears above Amiya's head.
'I won't allow that, Theresa!'
